title: Module "Software-Praktikum"
description: Project 1: Develop a simple card-based board game individually.
Project 2: Group-based development of board game 'Bonsai'.
Development pipeline: Design (Entities, Services and Views with UML), Implementation (daily commits), Testing, Deployment.

title: Self-project "Skyblock Simulator"
description: A website for simulation of mechanisms and various tools for the game "Hypixel Skyblock".
Frontend in Angular 19 with Server Side Rendering.
Small backend in NodeJS with Express as a proxy between client and Hypixel API.

title: Contribution to a Minecraft Mod
description: Contributor for the quality-of-life mod "SkyHanni" of hannibal02.
Have implemented a few features and bug fixes.

title: Spark: A Twitter-like social media platform
description: This was a part of the module "Webtechnologien 2" at TU Dortmund.
Frontend with Angular 16, Backend with Spring Boot 3.
Provides simple CRUD operations for posts, comments and likes.
